div.p: Apple's Identity Management group is looking for a Senior software Engineer in provisioning space. We are seeking a skilled computer engineer who will design a solution that will be the provisioning backbone for the enterprise. Provisioning engine will support the deployment of rules for real-time evaluation allowing business units the ability to change access & processes rapidly. We desire a self-motivated individual who can thrive in an Agile environment, while interacting and communicating effectively with other team members. This position requires extensive experience implementing advanced Computer Science paradigms and sound analytical ability.
